actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the offering of prayer in public buildings.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that nothing contained in the Constitution shall abridge right of persons lawfully assembled, in any public building which is supported in whole or in part through the expenditure of public funds, to participate in voluntary prayer.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the offering of prayer in public buildings.
